title: Mods have something against me.
body:
They removed this fucking thread for "spam" .. What the fuck? Can you not fucking read? The point of so many repetitions of the same two sentences was to convey HOW MANY TIMES I FUCKING SAID IT. These mods seriously have no fucking brains. 
http://imgur.com/UWEkNo9

They did the same fucking thing to me when I GENUINELY ASKED if a streamer had Aspergers.. I ACTUALLY WANTED TO KNOW, and it got removed for "being a jerk"
Hey mods, here's some news: Autism isn't a fucking insult, even when it's used in such context.
